Articles.Content: For the last six months I've been.....lets say "busy". I haven't played KSP since February. Today I log in to update and scan the forums and HOLY MOTHER OF GOD!!!! What a difference! NASA missions, new parts, and what's this? 64bit Windows version!!!!??? ARE YOU KIDDING ME?!! Windows 64 bit version!!! Squad, I love you guys sooo much!! Thank you. Thank you. Thank you. Thank you!!
64-bit KSP is unstable. Beware of crashes.

64-bit KSP is unstable. Beware of crashes.

It is?

That's funny, i haven't ever had a crash with it yet.

64-bit KSP is unstable. Beware of crashes.

Since 0.24 I've crashed once with 32-bit because of excessive mod use and not at all with 64-bit.

...and haven't had a stock-based crash in months.

As far as I can tell, 64-bit is infinitely more stable

Seriously though, it may have instability issues occasionally so don't be surprised if you get more crashes than usual. It just seems that some of us are lucky enough to be having a problem with it.

Anyway,

Welcome back Genolution. There's plenty of changes to look at

64-bit KSP is unstable. Beware of crashes.
Dude, love your precise node mod. Thanks for that. Just downloaded it. I'll be crossing my fingers this 64bit KSP wont give me much trouble.
I've got absolutely no idea who you are, but welcome back!
I've always fantasized about quitting KSP for a year just to get a huge kergasm from all the updates I've missed. But that's never gonna happen.

or just invent a time machine - go in to the future where squad is release version 2.0 and droooooooollll

(after or before killing hitler and saving jfk idk)
